activity: Guided Historical Tour of Münster's Old Town
description: Explore Münster's rich history with a guided walking tour through its old town, including landmarks and hidden gems.

locationInfo.description: A historical tour covering the Prinzipalmarkt, St. Lamberti Church, and Münster’s famous town hall.
safetyTips: Wear warm clothing and comfortable shoes.
Stay together as a group, especially in busy areas.
Listen to the guide for interesting historical insights.

activity: Escape Room Challenge at Rätselraum Münster
description: Put your teamwork to the test in an exciting escape room experience.

locationInfo.description: An immersive escape room adventure with various themes and difficulty levels.
safetyTips: Follow game rules for a smooth experience.

description: Enjoy a fun and competitive bowling session at Münster’s top bowling center.

locationInfo.description: A modern bowling alley with multiple lanes, perfect for group competitions.
safetyTips: Wear bowling shoes for safety and performance.
Stretch before playing to prevent injuries.
Respect other players and take turns properly.

activity: Ice Skating at Münster Ice Arena
description: Glide across the ice with your group at Münster’s indoor ice skating rink.

locationInfo.description: A well-maintained ice rink where groups can enjoy skating and friendly competitions.
safetyTips: Skate at a controlled speed to avoid falls.

description: Take a peaceful winter hike through the scenic Hohenfelder Holz forest.

locationInfo.description: A scenic winter hike through Münster’s beautiful forested area with frost-covered trees and fresh air.
safetyTips: Wear warm layers and sturdy waterproof boots.
Bring a thermos with hot tea or coffee.
Stay on marked trails for safety.
